name: Beetle Lady
description:
This game was made for Magical Girl Game Jam 5.  The genres I chose were Platformer and Beat em'up.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In a world where there are people with magic powers, a misterious villain wants to take possession of their powers to eat their world and be powerful.

The magical people were called to find this villain and defeat them. And Beetle Lady is one of these magical people that was chosen to fulfill this mission.
